messages.content: Here is some information about the 2023 Pod Racing season: Race 1 was the Tatooine Grand Prix, won by Senn Kava. Provide 2 prompts and completions based on this data in JSONL format.

{"prompt": "What was the name of the first race in the 2023 Pod Racing season?", "completion": "The Tatooine Grand Prix."}
{"prompt": "Who won the Tatooine Grand Prix?", "completion": "Senn Kava."}
